title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy for a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when viewing the scoped type hierarchy for a binary project.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant). 2. Try to view the scoped type hierarchy. 3. Observe the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
